name: pycshop

scripts.backend: concurrently "cd microservice/api_gateway && node index.js" "cd microservice/auth_service && node app.js" "cd microservice/product_service && node app.js" "cd microservice/admin_service && node app.js" "cd microservice/shop_service && node server.js" "cd microservice/danhgia_service && node server.js" "cd microservice/cart_service && node server.js" "cd microservice/order_service && node server.js" "cd microservice/promotion_service && node server.js" "cd microservice/user_service && node server.js" "cd microservice/notification_service && node server.js"
scripts.backend-realtime: concurrently "cd microservice/api_gateway && node index.js" "cd microservice/auth_service && node app.js" "cd microservice/product_service && node app.js" "cd microservice/admin_service && node app.js" "cd microservice/shop_service && node server.js" "cd microservice/danhgia_service && node server.js" "cd microservice/cart_service && node server.js" "cd microservice/order_service && nodemon server.js" "cd microservice/promotion_service && node server.js" "cd microservice/user_service && node server.js" "cd microservice/notification_service && nodemon server.js"
scripts.kafka:ui: echo Opening Kafka UI at http://localhost:8080 && start http://localhost:8080
scripts.start:kafka: npm run kafka:start && node scripts/wait.js 10 Kafka
scripts.start:redis: npm run redis:start && node scripts/wait.js 5 Redis
scripts.start:services: npm run services:start && node scripts/wait.js 10 "Redis and Kafka"
scripts.start:backend: npm run start:services && npm run backend-with-kafka
scripts.start:backend-realtime: npm run start:services && node scripts/wait.js 15 "Backend services" && npm run backend-realtime-with-kafka
scripts.start:full: npm run start:services && concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run backend-with-kafka"
scripts.start:full-realtime: npm run kafka:start && node scripts/wait.js 15 "Kafka" && concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run backend-realtime"
scripts.production: npm run build && npm run backend

description: This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with HMR and some ESLint rules.
